cards.name: Giganta
cards.description: +4 Power if there are no cards with cost 3 or less in your discard pile. Otherwise, +2 Power.

cards.name: Emperor Penguin
cards.description: When you destroy this card in any zone, gain 2 VPs.

cards.name: Atomica
cards.description: You may destroy a non-Villain card in your hand or discard pile. If its cost is 1 or greater, gain 1 VP.

cards.name: The Blight
cards.description: You may destroy a card in your hand or discard pile. If it's a Super Power, +Power equal to its cost.

cards.name: Despero
cards.description: Draw two cards and choose a foe.

cards.name: Grid
cards.description:
+1 Power.
You may put a Villain or Equipment with cost 5 or less from you discard pile on top of your deck.

cards.name: Power Ring
cards.description: You may destroy a Hero in the Line-Up. +1 Power for each different Hero in the destroyed pile.

cards.name: Superwoman
cards.description: You may destroy a Villain in the Line-Up. +1 Power for each different Villain in the destroyed pile.

cards.name: Owlman
cards.description: You may destroy an Equipment in the Line-Up. +1 Power for each different Equipment in the destroyed pile.

cards.name: Ultraman
cards.description: You may destroy a card in the Line-Up. +1 Power for each different Super Power in the destroyed pile.

cards.name: Deathstrom
cards.description: You may destroy a card in your hand. At end of game, this card is worth 1 fewer VP for each card in excess of 20 in your deck. (Minimum 0.)

cards.name: Royal Flush Gang
cards.description: Draw two cards, and then discard two cards. Gain 1 VP for each other Royal Flush Gang you play or have played this turn.
